text: By your command, time will be granted to restructure both your forces, and your administration. Through diligent preparation, we shall plan our tactics for the next campaign.
A unit can function only as well as the capabilities of its commander. Your general will be given texts of tactics and scrolls of strategies, to read and review.
Much as a sheathed sword grows dull, a lax army grows complacent. Your officer shall ensure that even in times of peace, your armies remain drilled.
Your subordinate will conscript able bodied men from the local region, to bolster the manpower of your armies.
Your envoy shall reassure our lord that we continue to obey his will, and our purposes are shared.

[[b]]Military Assignments[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Assignment[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Improve General Experience\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Improve Unit Experience\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Recruitment reduced and Replenishment Increased\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Improve Relations with Liu Biao\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Use these assignments to improve your faction stance and surround.[[/col]][[/i]]
